item.title: Consumer confidence dips modestly in October with Americans concerned about the future
item.description: Consumer confidence weakened slightly in October as Americans remain anxious about their future financial prospects

item.title: Apple suppliers Qorvo and Skyworks will merge to create a chipmaker worth $22 billion
